Rogers.James A. Rice House: The James A. Rice House is a historic house at 204 Southeast Third Street in Bentonville, Arkansas. It is a 2-1/2 story brick structure, with tall arched windows and a bracketed cornice typical of the Italianate style. It has a two-story porch, asymmetrical massing, and a steeply pitched roof with cut-shingle gable finish typical of the Queen Anne style, which was in fashion when it was built c.
